name: Hell Can Wait
description:
Hell Can Wait is a diabolic action-roguelike that combines the furious, fast-paced combat of a bullet-hell shooter with the deep strategy of a deck-building card game. With over 250* cards to unlock, find the perfect combo to send the demon hordes back to Hell!

BRUTAL COMBAT: Pit your wits against the legions of Hell! Master your enemies’ bullet patterns to use their own attacks against them.



BUILD THE DECK YOU WANT: With over 250 cards to unlock, there are endless combinations to explore. Do you want a melee build, a defensive build, or will you double down on one of the many status effects?



AUGMENTED ANGELS: Unlock game-changing augments for your angel that can synergise with the deck you’ve crafted and make it even more deadly.



EPIC BOSSES: Face horrific demons straight from the nine levels of Hell. Designed to push your skills to the limits in intense battles, you’ll need to craft the perfect deck to send them back to Hell.

*Not 250 cards in the demo though. It's also probably never going to be finished, so enjoy the demo!
